name: UniformSpaceCat.instUnbundledHomUniformSpaceUniformContinuous
decl:

name: CpltSepUniformSpace.completeSpace
decl:

  CpltSepUniformSpace.isCompleteSpace X

name: CpltSepUniformSpace.t0Space

name: UniformSpaceCat.extensionHom_val
initialProofState:
X : UniformSpaceCat
Y : CpltSepUniformSpace
f : Quiver.Hom X ((CategoryTheory.forget‚ÇÇ CpltSepUniformSpace UniformSpaceCat).obj Y)
x : (CategoryTheory.forget CpltSepUniformSpace).obj (UniformSpaceCat.completionFunctor.obj X)

decl:

@[simp]
theorem extensionHom_val {X : UniformSpaceCat} {Y : CpltSepUniformSpace}
    (f : X ‚ü∂ (forget‚ÇÇ _ _).obj Y) (x) : (extensionHom f) x = Completion.extension f x :=
  rfl

name: UniformSpaceCat.extension_comp_coe
initialProofState:
X : UniformSpaceCat
Y : CpltSepUniformSpace
f : Quiver.Hom (CpltSepUniformSpace.of (UniformSpace.Completion ‚ÜëX)).toUniformSpace Y.toUniformSpace
‚ä¢ Eq (UniformSpaceCat.extensionHom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp X.completionHom f)) f
decl:
@[simp]
theorem extension_comp_coe {X : UniformSpaceCat} {Y : CpltSepUniformSpace}
    (f : toUniformSpace (CpltSepUniformSpace.of (Completion X)) ‚ü∂ toUniformSpace Y) :
    extensionHom (completionHom X ‚â´ f) = f := by
  apply Subtype.eq
  funext x
  exact congr_fun (Completion.extension_comp_coe f.property) x
